title: The Merry widow
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Joe Pasternak and Curtis Bernhardt
brief_description: Based on the operetta by Franz Lehar, libretto by Victor Leon and Leo Stein, this film adaptation stars Lana Turner as the “merry widow” supported by Thomas Gomez as the King of Marshovia and Fernando Lamas as the young Count Danilo. Oscar nominated for Best Art Direction/Set Decoration and Best Costumes. Cast also includes Una Merkel, Richard Haydn.
